comments: This place is number 3 on my all time restaurant list.
I will go out of my way to recommend and go to this place.
It seems the Fish Belly is no longer on the menu (hopefully it comes back)
Cookie Skillet is always RNG to see if it is on the dessert menu.
Other fire foods includes: 'On the Side', 'Raw Bar', Pork Hock, Half Chicken, Bone Marrow
